article_title: Toronto health officials warn to avoid coffee or dinner dates amid COVID-19 pandemic - CTV News
article_description: Toronto s chief medical officer of health called on residents Wednesday to go the extra step to practice social distancing as much as possible  saying that Toronto is at a critical juncture where we should anticipate a steep rise in cases
article_content: TORONTO    Torontos chief medical officer of health called on residents Wednesday to go the extra step to practice social distancing as much as possible  saying that Toronto is at a critical juncture where we should anticipate a steep rise in cases We wil   3265 chars
